info.name: Dark Mode for whitescreen online
info.description: Welp, userstyles.org throws an error with W3C validated CSS, even the simplest of CSS, like adding a color to a class throws an error, so we are currently unable to upload this here.
info.additionalInfo: whitescreen.online is a great web app to black out a monitor quickly when needed (like when watching a video on the primary monitor). It does not have a built-in dark mode however when not blacked out, and the bright white default background  got annoying when sitting in a dark room, so I created this dark mode for those times when the page is sitting around waiting to be used. - ShaneX
